description: Enforce 7-field stub schema and add JSON validation to prevent invalid stubs from breaking the API. Fixed two invalid stub files with backticks and unquoted values.
context: Discovered that stub.json files were being created with over-engineered fields containing JavaScript code examples with backticks, causing JSON parse errors in the dashboard API. Fixed realtime-sync-system and known-issues-utility stubs by removing invalid code_example fields and quoting unquoted array values. Created stub.md command documentation enforcing strict 7-field schema. Enhanced StubReader with field validation and specific error messages for JSON parse failures and missing required fields.
